jcr:content.jcr:description: The Altra RED Team Ambassadors are runners of all distances and athletes of all disciplines ready to push themselves and others to move naturally and unite.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Altra R.E.D. Team Ambassadors

image.alt: Text overlay of "The Altra R.E.D. Team" with images of a woman running in the woods, a man standing on a rock with outstretched arms, and a woman in a red Altra shirt holding a sign of the RED Team logo

text_1817184694.text:
REACH.

We are constantly striving to reach new people, new goals, and new perspectives. 


ELEVATE.

Our goal is to take everything we do to the next level.


DISCOVER.

Always seek to discover new limits within ourselves.

text.text:
WHO WE ARE 

 

Runners of all distances, athletes of all disciplines. 

The R.E.D. Team is a global collection of more than 600 Altra-loving runners, adventurers, and triathletes driven to push their limits and live life to the fullest!

WHAT WE DO 

 

We push ourselves and each other.  

The mission of the R.E.D. Team is to inspire communities around the world to move naturally, amplify each other’s voices, and unite athletes of all kinds.

R.E.D. TEAM MEMBERS 

 

Are 100% committed to the brand. 

Represent Altra proudly and bring others into the Altra family. 

Assist at local Altra sponsored events throughout the year. 

Display R.E.D. Team membership on social profiles and highlight Altra regularly. 

Compete clean and uphold the highest standard of sportsmanship. 

Have fun, compete hard, and share the brand!
R.E.D. TEAM APPLICATIONS ARE CLOSED FOR 2022

ctabutton.buttontext: CHECK OUT OUR ELITE ATHLETE TEAM
